title: did not recive rp from gift
body: my brother gave me on my other account which is currently in a 14 day suspensions some rp and that account has not received it yet do i have to wait til the 3rd? when the suspension is up?

replies.body: It may take some time for the purchase to process depending on the bank and payment method.  If it's not there after a bit, he can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look.  We'll be able to help find out if it went through or not.  Hope that helps!
